instruction.value: Initial dose. Administer by direct injection.

additionalnotes.value: Hemodialysis/Hemofiltration. Chronic Renal Failure: Sessions up to a maximum of 4 hours.
Hemodialysis/Hemofiltration. Chronic Renal Failure: Sessions longer than 4 hours.
Hemodialysis/Hemofiltration. Acute Renal Failure / patients with high bleeding risk: Sessions longer than 4 hours.
Unstable Coronary Artery Disease/ NSTEMI. MAX dose: 10 000 unit Q12H.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weight less than or equal to 47 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 48 to 52 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 53 to 57 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 58 to 62 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 63 to 67 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 68 to 72 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 73 to 77 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weighing from 78 to 82 kg.
Cardiology. Dose rounding for patient weight greater than or equal to 83 kg.
